Antipattern: error swallowing

Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'base_type', 'nulable_type', 'assignable_type', 'var_type', 'meth_type', 'access_modifier', 'method_modifier', 'fild_modifier' as follows:
type base_type =
  | TInt 
  | TChar 
  | TBool 
type nulable_type =
  | TBase of base_type 
  | TString 
  | TClass of ident 
type assignable_type =
  | TNot_Nullable of base_type 
  | TNullable of nulable_type [@@ocaml.doc " Type that can be assigne "]
type var_type =
  | TVar of assignable_type [@@ocaml.doc " Variable type "][@@deriving
                                                             ((show
                                                                 {
                                                                   with_path
                                                                    = false
                                                                 }), eq)]
type meth_type =
  | Void 
  | TReturn of assignable_type [@@deriving
                                 ((show { with_path = false }), eq)]
type access_modifier =
  | MPublic 
  | MPrivate 
  | MProtected 
type method_modifier =
  | MAccess of access_modifier 
  | MStatic 
type fild_modifier =
  | FAccess of access_modifier
